title: A Thank You
body:
I’m going to keep this brief, as after all, nobody likes a self-indulgent hispter, do they?

Today marks the second birthday of **Crack in the Road**, and for that, myself and all the other writers are immensely grateful for the support, encouragement, and most importantly, passion that each and every reader has shown towards us.

Conceived as a humble blog, **CitR** has developed into a website that all of us are hugely proud of, and that has presented us with initially unfathomable opportunities. As readers have turned into writers, and writers into friends, we cannot express just how thankful we are for people taking the time to read, to listen and to think; three vices that cannot be overestimated, especially in a world increasingly filled with animosity and dissatisfaction. Thank you, and may the next two years be equally as enjoyable.
